project.name: 941 Infrastructure Improvements
project.description: SEO and analytics data quality improvements across 941 properties

stories.title: Implement www to non-www redirects
stories.description: Add 301 redirects from www.domain.com to domain.com for all zones to consolidate SEO authority
acceptance_criteria: blakecrosley.com: www redirects to non-www with 301
resumegeni.com: www redirects to non-www with 301
acecitizenship.app: www redirects to non-www with 301
All redirects preserve path and query string
stories.blocker: API token lacks Page Rules and Redirect Rules permissions. Requires token update in Cloudflare dashboard.

stories.title: Filter localhost/dev traffic from analytics
stories.description: Prevent localhost and 127.0.0.1 URLs from being recorded in the analytics database
acceptance_criteria: Requests with url containing localhost are rejected
Requests with url containing 127.0.0.1 are rejected
Requests with url containing 0.0.0.0 are rejected
Rejection happens early to save DB resources
stories.blocker: Awaiting deployment: run 'cd worker && wrangler login && npm run deploy'
